item.description:
"The Semi Finals"

The winners of Club Passim's Season III  will gather for one last showdown of words at Club Passim, Cambridge.

 

Come and vote for your favorite story of the season along with the judges.

This Season's Themes at Passims

"wheels" 

"idols"

"genesis"

"shellshocked"

Don't be left out Passim's has been known to sell out. 

Tickets: $15

Get yours tickets at:

http://tickets.passim.org/

  Passim @ 47 Palmer Street, Cambridge, MA @ 7:00pm

Winners will go on to the Big Mouth Off to compete with finalists from other Boston slams on April 11, 2012 at Coolidge Corner Theater's main theater to compete for a week in a medieval townhouse in Tuscany ,A two nights stay at Inn Magnolia in Gloucester ,Mass, and a 3 hour coaching session from the man that wrote the book on coaching storytelling, Mr. Doug Lipman.  

Passim, a nonprofit arts organization, creates an interactive and inspiring music experience for all.

 

We are in the basement of an 1830 brick delivery building and carriage house on the corner of Church and Palmer streets.

————————————–

Directions: Via the T

Take Red Line to Harvard Square T stop.

• Exit via Church Street entrance Walk one block down Church Street past Harvard Square Theater to Palmer Street on left. We are in the basement just around the corner on the left.

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: Passim - Semifinals Story Slam is sold out!
